verses.verse: Be<WG1096> ye followers<WG3402> of me<WG3450>, even as<WG2531> I also<WG2504> am of Christ<WG5547>.

But<WG1161> I would have<WG2309> you<WG5209> know<WG1492>, that<WG3754> the head<WG2776> of every<WG3956> man<WG435> is<WG2076> Christ<WG5547>; and<WG1161> the head<WG2776> of the woman<WG1135> is the man<WG435>; and<WG1161> the head<WG2776> of Christ<WG5547> is God<WG2316>.
Every<WG3956> man<WG435> praying<WG4336> or<WG2228> prophesying<WG4395>, having<WG2192> his head<WG2776> covered<WG2596>, dishonoureth<WG2617> his<WG846> head<WG2776>.

But<WG1161> every<WG3956> woman<WG1135> that prayeth<WG4336> or<WG2228> prophesieth<WG4395> with her head<WG2776> uncovered<WG177> dishonoureth<WG2617> her<WG1438> head<WG2776>: for<WG1063> that is<WG2076> even<WG2532> all one<WG1520> as if<WG846> she were shaven<WG3587>.

For<WG1063> if<WG1487> the woman<WG1135> be<WG2619> not<WG3756> covered<WG2619>, let her<WG2751> also<WG2532> be shorn<WG2751>: but<WG1161> if<WG1487> it be a shame<WG149> for a woman<WG1135> to be shorn<WG2751> or<WG2228> shaven<WG3587>, let her be covered<WG2619>.

For<WG1063> a man<WG435> indeed<WG3303> ought<WG3784> not<WG3756> to cover<WG2619> his head<WG2776>, forasmuch as he is<WG5225> the image<WG1504> and<WG2532> glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316>: but<WG1161> the woman<WG1135> is<WG2076> the glory<WG1391> of the man<WG435>.
For<WG1063> the man<WG435> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> the woman<WG1135>; but<WG235> the woman<WG1135> of<WG1537> the man<WG435>.
<WG1063><WG2532>Neither<WG3756> was<WG2936> the man<WG435> created<WG2936> for<WG1223> the woman<WG1135>; but<WG235> the woman<WG1135> for<WG1223> the man<WG435>.
For this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> ought<WG3784> the woman<WG1135> to have<WG2192> power<WG1849> on<WG1909> her head<WG2776> because<WG1223> of the angels<WG32>.
Nevertheless<WG4133> neither<WG3777> is the man<WG435> without<WG5565> the woman<WG1135>, neither<WG3777> the woman<WG1135> without<WG5565> the man<WG435>, in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.

For<WG1063> as<WG5618> the woman<WG1135> is of<WG1537> the man<WG435>, even so<WG3779> is the man<WG435> also<WG2532> by<WG1223> the woman<WG1135>; but<WG1161> all things<WG3956> of<WG1537> God<WG2316>.
Judge<WG2919> in<WG1722> yourselves<WG5213><WG846>: is it<WG2076> comely<WG4241> that a woman<WG1135> pray<WG4336> unto God<WG2316> uncovered<WG177>?

Doth<WG2228> not even<WG3761> nature<WG5449> itself<WG846> teach<WG1321> you<WG5209>, that<WG3754>, if<WG1437><WG3303> a man<WG435> have long hair<WG2863>, it is<WG2076> a shame<WG819> unto him<WG846>?
But<WG1161> if<WG1437> a woman<WG1135> have long hair<WG2863>, it is<WG2076> a glory<WG1391> to her<WG846>: for<WG3754> her hair<WG2864> is given<WG1325> her<WG846> for<WG473> a covering<WG4018>.
But<WG1161> if any man<WG1536> seem<WG1380> to be<WG1511> contentious<WG5380>, we<WG2249> have<WG2192> no<WG3756> such<WG5108> custom<WG4914>, neither<WG3761> the churches<WG1577> of God<WG2316>.

Now<WG1161> in this<WG5124> that I declare<WG3853> unto you I praise<WG1867> you not<WG3756>, that<WG3754> ye come together<WG4905> not<WG3756> for<WG1519> the better<WG2909>, but<WG235> for<WG1519> the worse<WG2276>.

For<WG1063><WG3303> first of all<WG4412>, when ye<WG5216> come together<WG4905> in<WG1722> the church<WG1577>, I hear<WG191> that there be<WG5225> divisions<WG4978> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>; and<WG2532> I partly<WG3313> believe<WG4100> it<WG5100>.

For<WG1063> there must<WG1163> be<WG1511> also<WG2532> heresies<WG139> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>, that<WG2443> they which are approved<WG1384> may be made<WG1096> manifest<WG5318> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>.
When ye<WG5216> come together<WG4905> therefore<WG3767> into<WG1909> one place<WG846>, this is<WG2076> not<WG3756> to eat<WG5315> the Lord's<WG2960> supper<WG1173>.

For<WG1063> in<WG1722> eating<WG5315> every one<WG1538> taketh before<WG4301> other his own<WG2398> supper<WG1173>: and<WG2532> one<WG3739><WG3303> is hungry<WG3983>, and<WG1161> another<WG3739> is drunken<WG3184>.

What<WG1063>? have ye<WG2192> not<WG3378> houses<WG3614> to eat<WG2068> and<WG2532> to drink<WG4095> in<WG1519>? or<WG2228> despise ye<WG2706> the church<WG1577> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> shame<WG2617> them that have<WG2192> not<WG3361>? What<WG5101> shall I say<WG2036> to you<WG5213>? shall I praise<WG1867> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> this<WG5129>? I praise<WG1867> you not<WG3756>.

For<WG1063> I<WG1473> have received<WG3880> of<WG575> the Lord<WG2962> that which<WG3739> also<WG2532> I delivered<WG3860> unto you<WG5213>, That<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> the same night<WG3571> in<WG1722> which<WG3739> he was betrayed<WG3860> took<WG2983> bread<WG740>:

And<WG2532> when he had given thanks<WG2168>, he brake<WG2806> it, and<WG2532> said<WG2036>, Take<WG2983>, eat<WG5315>: this<WG5124> is<WG2076> my<WG3450> body<WG4983>, which<WG3588> is broken<WG2806> for<WG5228> you<WG5216>: this<WG5124> do<WG4160> in<WG1519> remembrance<WG364> of me<WG1699>.

After the same manner<WG5615> also<WG2532> he took the cup<WG4221>, when<WG3326> he had supped<WG1172>, saying<WG3004>, This<WG5124> cup<WG4221> is<WG2076> the new<WG2537> testament<WG1242> in<WG1722> my<WG1699> blood<WG129>: this<WG5124> do ye<WG4160>, as oft as<WG3740><WG302> ye drink<WG4095> it, in<WG1519> remembrance<WG364> of me<WG1699>.

For<WG1063> as often as<WG302><WG3740> ye eat<WG2068> this<WG5126> bread<WG740>, and<WG2532> drink<WG4095> this<WG5124> cup<WG4221>, ye do shew<WG2605> the Lord's<WG2962> death<WG2288> till<WG891><WG302> he<WG3739> come<WG2064>.

Wherefore<WG5620> whosoever<WG3739><WG302> shall eat<WG2068> this<WG5126> bread<WG740>, and<WG2228> drink<WG4095> this cup<WG4221> of the Lord<WG2962>, unworthily<WG371>, shall be<WG2071> guilty<WG1777> of the body<WG4983> and<WG2532> blood<WG129> of the Lord<WG2962>.
But<WG1161> let<WG1381> a man<WG444> examine<WG1381> himself<WG1438>, and<WG2532> so<WG3779> let him eat<WG2068> of<WG1537> that bread<WG740>, and<WG2532> drink<WG4095> of<WG1537> that cup<WG4221>.

For<WG1063> he that eateth<WG2068> and<WG2532> drinketh<WG4095> unworthily<WG371>, eateth<WG2068> and<WG2532> drinketh<WG4095> damnation<WG2917> to himself<WG1438>, not<WG3361> discerning<WG1252> the Lord's<WG2962> body<WG4983>.
For<WG1223> this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> many<WG4183> are weak<WG772> and<WG2532> sickly<WG732> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> many<WG2425> sleep<WG2837>.
For<WG1063> if<WG1487> we would judge<WG1252> ourselves<WG1438>, we should<WG302> not<WG3756> be judged<WG2919>.
But<WG1161> when we are judged<WG2919>, we are chastened<WG3811> of<WG5259> the Lord<WG2962>, that<WG3363> we should<WG2632> not<WG3363> be condemned<WG2632> with<WG4862> the world<WG2889>.
Wherefore<WG5620>, my<WG3450> brethren<WG80>, when ye come together<WG4905> to<WG1519> eat<WG5315>, tarry<WG1551> one for another<WG240>.

And<WG1161> if any man<WG1536> hunger<WG3983>, let him eat<WG2068> at<WG1722> home<WG3624>; that<WG3363> ye come<WG4905> not<WG3363> together<WG4905> unto<WG1519> condemnation<WG2917>. And<WG1161> the rest<WG3062> will I set in order<WG1299> when<WG5613><WG302> I come<WG2064>.
